statements: DELETE FROM researchers WHERE research_field = 'Bioinformatics' AND drug_targets_found ->> 'target_name' = 'GeneX';
DELETE FROM GenomicsData WHERE data_id = 100 AND researcher_id = 2;
DELETE FROM genomics_data WHERE researcher_id = 101 AND data_type = 'RNA-seq';
DELETE FROM drug_targets WHERE researcher_id = 3 AND target_id = 5
DELETE FROM GenomicsData WHERE data_id = 100 AND rna_expression > 0.5;
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE name = 'John Doe' OR affiliation = 'Research Institute';
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND date < '2022-01-01';
